pageContent: Objectives: This paper aims to determine whether racial disparities exist in hospitalization outcomes among African-American and White hospitalized prostate cancer patients in the United States. We evaluated racial differences among matched groups of patients in post-operative complications, hospital length of stay and in-hospital mortality.

metaData.source:
Resolution of Cellular Heterogeneity in Human Prostate Cancers: Implications for Diagnosis and Treatment
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31576551/
